title: Yosemite National Park: Meadow Photo Series
body: Meadow Photo Series       Meadows in the Sierra Nevada typically go through five hydrologic stages driven by snowmelt. View a photo timeline of Tuolumne Meadows: snowmelt, flooding, inundation, growing season, and drying season.        Stage 1: Snomelt Photos from Steven Loheide        Stage 2: Flooding         Stage 3: Water Flow Inundation         Stage 4: Growing Season         Stage 5: Drying Season
